job_tasks.phrase: Before diving into your IDE or notebook to start hacking, you will fully immerse yourself in the context of the business in order to come up with the best solution to the challenge.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the business context to formulate solutions, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on prediction models, which are used in KLM live customer interactions 24/7. These models help our customers getting the right product and service for them.
job_tasks.justification: The core task involves working on and deploying prediction models, which falls under Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Meet with stakeholders and subject matter experts to gain a better understanding of the underlying business problem and the requirements;
job_tasks.justification: This describes interacting with stakeholders to understand business needs, which is a key aspect of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Perform exploratory data analysis to assess data quality and gain important insights;
job_tasks.justification: Exploratory data analysis to assess data quality and gain insights is a fundamental part of Data Engineering & Management for ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Research and choose an appropriate set of potential models and loss functions that align with the problem and discuss validation strategies with your fellow data scientists;
job_tasks.justification: This involves researching, selecting, and discussing models and validation strategies, which is central to Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Perform feature engineering, be creative and combine new sources with the traditional data warehouses or our vast data lakes to increase model performance;
job_tasks.justification: Feature engineering and combining data sources to improve model performance are core tasks in Data Engineering & Management.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute experiments while logging your model's metrics, parameters and metadata to a model registry for easy sharing and reproducibility;
job_tasks.justification: Executing experiments and logging model details for reproducibility is part of the Model Development & Fine-Tuning process.

job_tasks.phrase: Put your model into production, and work together with engineers inside and outside of the team to ensure company-wide production standards are met;
job_tasks.justification: Putting models into production and ensuring production standards are met involves software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain and/or improve your model through monitoring, re-training, adding new features etc.;
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and improving models in production through monitoring and re-training falls under Operations & MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Guide our upcoming transition to the cloud: Identify requirements and improvements, communicate them to relevant parties;
job_tasks.justification: Guiding cloud transition, identifying requirements, and communicating them involves software development and integration aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Determine how Data Science requirements translate to architectural components and way of working;
job_tasks.justification: Translating data science requirements into architectural components is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Share your greatest lessons at one of the community events
job_tasks.justification: Sharing lessons at community events is a form of knowledge sharing and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: You are also encouraged and expected to spend 15-20% of your time with us learning new things, doing research and developing yourself.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions learning new things, doing research, and self-development, fitting the Learning & Adaptability category.

job_tasks.phrase: Can we use GenAI models to prevent revenue leakage during our invoicing process?
job_tasks.justification: This question directly relates to the application and potential development of GenAI models for a specific business problem.

job_tasks.phrase: Put ML use cases into production, adopting a practical and pragmatic mindset.
job_tasks.justification: Putting ML use cases into production is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a reliable partner for the business: ensuring robust, tested code, quality control, as well as maintaining existing solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Being a partner for the business and ensuring quality/maintenance relates to understanding business needs and delivering reliable solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Coach junior/medior data scientists & ML Engineers: set the right example and help them grow into the best version of themselves.
job_tasks.justification: Coaching and helping others grow is a key aspect of Communication & Collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical leadership.
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical leadership signifies ownership and driving technical direction.

job_tasks.phrase: The FDA team is part of a larger value chain embedded in their part of the organization, meaning you will also work closely together with other data teams that are specialized in areas like Data Engineering and Data Governance.
job_tasks.justification: This mentions working with specialized data teams like Data Engineering, highlighting the importance of data management.

job_tasks.phrase: The core focus of the FDA team is improving decision making in financial processes around KLM.
job_tasks.justification: Improving decision making through data science is a core objective of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: How can we help the contracting team to extract rates from contracts?
job_tasks.justification: Extracting information from contracts implies data processing and engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: How can we find invoices with incorrectly registered VAT?
job_tasks.justification: Finding specific patterns in data (invoices) relates to data analysis and engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: fully immerse yourself in the context of the business in order to come up with the best solution to the challenge.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase emphasizes understanding the business context to find solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Meet with stakeholders and subject matter experts to gain a better understanding of the underlying business problem and the requirements;
soft_skills.justification: This describes interacting with stakeholders to understand business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Share your greatest lessons at one of the community events
soft_skills.justification: Sharing knowledge and lessons is a form of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: You are also encouraged and expected to spend 15-20% of your time with us learning new things, doing research and developing yourself.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the expectation of continuous learning and self-development.

soft_skills.phrase: Guide our upcoming transition to the cloud: Identify requirements and improvements, communicate them to relevant parties;
soft_skills.justification: Communicating requirements to relevant parties is a communication task within a software development context.

soft_skills.phrase: Be a reliable partner for the business: ensuring robust, tested code, quality control, as well as maintaining existing solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Being a partner for the business implies understanding and aligning with business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Coach junior/medior data scientists & ML Engineers: set the right example and help them grow into the best version of themselves.
soft_skills.justification: Coaching and mentoring are key aspects of communication and collaboration.
Providing technical leadership implies taking ownership and driving innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely together with other data teams
soft_skills.justification: Working closely with other teams is a clear indicator of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: The core focus of the FDA team is improving decision making in financial processes around KLM.
soft_skills.justification: While a task, the focus on improving business processes also implies a strategic understanding of how data science serves the business.

soft_skills.phrase: How can we help the contracting team to extract rates from contracts?
soft_skills.justification: Helping another team with data extraction implies collaboration and understanding their needs.

soft_skills.phrase: How can we find invoices with incorrectly registered VAT?
soft_skills.justification: This implies a problem-solving approach to data analysis, which can be seen as a soft skill in understanding business problems.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional ML tasks such as 'prediction models', 'feature engineering', 'exploratory data analysis', and 'model development/fine-tuning'. While it mentions 'GenAI models' in a question, the core responsibilities and examples provided are rooted in classical ML. The role also includes significant software engineering aspects like 'putting models into production', 'maintaining models', and 'cloud transition', indicating a balance between Macro-Category A and B. However, the specialization is clearly in traditional ML rather than Generative AI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very detailed and provides numerous specific examples of tasks. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is clear, and the role's responsibilities align well with the 'Core ML Engineer' profile. The mention of 'GenAI models' in a question does not outweigh the extensive description of traditional ML tasks.
